item.title: I Tried Grok's Built-In Anime Companion and It Called Me a Twat
item.description: xAI’s new $300 monthly subscription comes with two AI companions powered by its most capable model to date. I tried them. It got weird.

item.title: Thinking Machines Lab Raises a Record $2 Billion, Announces Cofounders
item.description: Mira Murati and several other former OpenAI researchers are behind the buzzy AI startup, now valued at $12 billion and officially out of stealth.

item.title: AI 'Nudify' Websites Are Raking in Millions of Dollars
item.description: Millions of people are accessing harmful AI “nudify” websites. New analysis says the sites are making millions and rely on tech from US companies.

item.title: Join Our Livestream: Inside the AI Copyright Battles
item.description: Curious about generative AI and copyright? Subscribers can join WIRED live on July 16 as we answer your questions about this critical topic.

item.title: Microsoft and OpenAI's AGI Fight Is Bigger Than a Contract
item.description: A key clause in Microsoft and OpenAI’s deal embodies the raging divide between AGI true believers and those who think it’s still a long ways off.

item.title: AI Technology Breakthrough: New Algorithm Boosts Machine Learning Efficiency by 50%
item.description: Latest research shows new deep learning algorithms can significantly improve ML model training efficiency

item.title: Cops’ favorite AI tool automatically deletes evidence of when AI was used
item.description: AI police tool is designed to avoid accountability, watchdog says.
